metadata.title: Hello World
metadata.description: Your first interactive story - learn the basics in under 1 minute
metadata.author: Whisker Team

passages.title: Start
passages.content:
Welcome to your first interactive story!

This is a **passage** - a single scene or moment in your story.

Choices appear as links. Try clicking one:

[[Continue to the next passage -> next]]

---

**Tip:** You can format text with Markdown:
- **Bold** with `**text**`
- *Italic* with `*text*`
- Links with `[[Link Text -> TargetPassage]]`

passages.title: The End
passages.content:
Congratulations! üéâ

You've just experienced an interactive story.

**You've learned:**
- Stories are made of **passages** (scenes)
- **Choices** let readers navigate
- The **start passage** is where stories begin
- **Markdown** formats your text

**Next steps:**
1. Close the preview (top-left button)
2. Try editing the passages in the editor
3. Add your own choice to create a third passage
4. Explore the other example stories

Happy writing! ‚úçÔ∏è
